verbose_text: Compared with the cells exposed to H/SD, the Bcl-2 / Bax ratio was significantly increased in the group treated with 100 muM nicorandil (treated cells, 1.61 +/-0.10 vs. apoptotic control, 0.50 +/-0.10; XREF_FIG and D), and the levels of caspase-3, a key mediator of apoptosis, were decreased (treated cells, 0.37 +/-0.04 vs. apoptotic control, 0.54 +/-0.06; XREF_FIG and F).
